attributes.synopsis: New kid Keiichi Maebara is settling into his new home of peaceful Hinamizawa village. Making quick friends with the girls from his school, he's arrived in time for the big festival of the year. But something about this isolated town seems "off," and his feelings of dread continue to grow. With a gnawing fear that he's right, what dark secrets could this small community be hiding?(Source: Funimation)
attributes.description: New kid Keiichi Maebara is settling into his new home of peaceful Hinamizawa village. But something about this isolated town seems "off," and his feelings of dread continue to grow. With a gnawing fear that he's right, what dark secrets could this small community be hiding?(Source: Funimation)

titles.en_jp: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Gou
titles.ja_jp: ひぐらしのなく頃に

attributes.canonicalTitle: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Gou
abbreviatedTitles: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni (Shin Project)

attributes.synopsis:
Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai continues the story from the first series and sheds light on many of the dark mysteries prevalent in the first season. The young group of friends in the town of Hinamizawa continue to have terrible conflicts with one another in their never ending summer of 1983, often ending with the brutal murder of one of their members. With the help of her spiritual friend, Hanyuu, Furude Rika tackles these challenges over and over, trying her best to keep their lives from coming to a tragic end. With no end to the torture in sight, Rika must call upon the bonds of friendship and trust among her friends to discover the true villain of this eternal June.
[Written by MAL Rewrite]
attributes.description:

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

titles.en_jp: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai
titles.ja_jp: ひぐらしのなく頃に解

attributes.canonicalTitle: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kai
abbreviatedTitles: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni 2nd Series

attributes.synopsis:
Keiichi Maebara has just moved to the quiet little village of Hinamizawa in the summer of 1983, and quickly becomes inseparable friends with schoolmates Rena Ryuuguu, Mion Sonozaki, Satoko Houjou, and Rika Furude. However, darkness lurks underneath the seemingly idyllic life they lead. 
As the village prepares for its annual festival, Keiichi learns about the local legends surrounding it. To his horror, he discovers that there have been several murders and disappearances in the village in the recent years, and that they all seem to be connected to the festival and the village's patron god, Oyashiro. Keiichi tries to ask his new friends about these incidents, but they are suspiciously silent and refuse to give him the answers he needs. As more and more bizarre events occur, he wonders just what else his friends might be keeping from him, and if he can even trust them at all.
When madness and paranoia begin taking root in Keiichi's heart, he will stumble straight into the mysteries at work in Higurashi no Naku Koro ni, a story that is told across multiple arcs.
[Written by MAL Rewrite]

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

titles.ja_jp: ひぐらしのなく頃に

attributes.synopsis:
The infamous series of unexplainable murders in Hinamizawa have been solved and the chains of fate have broken due to the efforts of Rika Furude and her friends. Rika believes she has finally obtained the normal and peaceful life she desired with her friends; however, she is proven wrong when the wheels of fate begin turning once again after an unfortunate accident.
Rika suddenly finds herself in a "perfect" world, the constant cycle of brutal killings having never taken place, where all of her friends are content and satisfied. Not wanting to abandon the world that she fought so hard for, she learns she must destroy an essential "key" to get back. But can Rika abandon the faultless world she is given the chance to live in, after all of her battles have brought her this far?
[Written by MAL Rewrite]
attributes.description:

titles.en_jp: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei
titles.ja_jp: ひぐらしのなく頃に礼

attributes.canonicalTitle: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei
abbreviatedTitles: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni 3rd Season
Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Dai San Ki

attributes.synopsis:
With things such as story out of the way, Higurashi cranks up the fanservice with Kira, a new OVA series to commemorate the series' 10th anniversary, featuring nail-biting situations such as Rika and Satoko becoming magical girls to battle evil magic crime syndicates with the help of their trusty squad of cheerleaders, among other things.
The excitement may be too much to handle. Do you dare step inside the... "different" world of Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kira?

The excitement may be too much to handle. Do you dare step inside the... "different" world of Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kira?

titles.ja_jp: ひぐらしのなく頃に煌

attributes.canonicalTitle: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kira
abbreviatedTitles: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni OVA 2

attributes.synopsis:
The story is set in the same Hinamizawa village of the previous stories. The village has been completely sealed off due to a mysterious virus in 1983, and Maebara Keiichi and Ryuuguu Rena deal with the outbreak.
(Source: ANN)
attributes.description:
The story is set in the same Hinamizawa village of the previous stories. The village has been completely sealed off due to a mysterious virus in 1983, and Maebara Keiichi and Ryuuguu Rena deal with the outbreak.
(Source: ANN)

titles.en_jp: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kaku: Outbreak
titles.ja_jp: ひぐらしのなく頃に拡〜アウトブレイク〜

attributes.canonicalTitle: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Kaku: Outbreak

attributes.synopsis:
Considered as the third installment in the highly popular When They Cry series by 07th Expansion, Umineko no Naku Koro ni takes place on the island of Rokkenjima, owned by the immensely wealthy Ushiromiya family. As customary per year, the entire family is gathering on the island for a conference that discusses the current financial situations of each respective person. Because of the family head's poor health, this year involves the topic of the head of the family's inheritance and how it will be distributed.
However, the family is unaware that the distribution of his wealth is the least of Ushiromiya Kinzou's (family head) concerns for this year's family conference. After being told that his end was approaching by his longtime friend and physician, Kinzou is desperate to meet his life's true love one last time: the Golden Witch, Beatrice. Having immersed himself in black magic for many of the later years in his life, Kinzou instigates a ceremony to revive his beloved upon his family's arrival on Rokkenjima. Soon after, a violent typhoon traps the family on the island and a string of mysterious murders commence, forcing the eighteen people on the island to fight for their lives in a deadly struggle between fantasy and reality.
[Written by MAL Rewrite]

attributes.synopsis: After losing a bet, Keichi, Mion, Rena, Satoko and Rika parade around the town in costumes. When they come to a fork in the road, they decide to go to Yagouchi, a nearby abandoned village. Once there Keichii and Rena learn the mystery of a strange haunted quarry as they debate whether or not to check it out.

titles.ja_jp: ひぐらしのなく頃に

attributes.synopsis: Keiichi Maebara, a student who recently moved into the village of Hinamizawa, is invited by his new friends at school to join their club. But while searching for treasure at a garbage dump, he discovers the village is not as peaceful as it seems.
attributes.description: Keiichi Maebara, a student who recently moved into the village of Hinamizawa, is invited by his new friends at school to join their club. But while searching for treasure at a garbage dump, he discovers the village is not as peaceful as it seems.

titles.en_us: The Beginning (Chapter: Spirited Away by the Demon, Part 1)
titles.ja_jp: 鬼隠し編 其ノ壱 ハジマリ

attributes.canonicalTitle: The Beginning (Chapter: Spirited Away by the Demon, Part 1)

attributes.synopsis: The Cotton Drifting Festival is coming up and everyone goes to have a day of fun. During the festival, Keiichi gets separated from everyone and he meets Tomitake the photographer again, who later tells him more about the shocking past of Hinamizawa.

attributes.description: Delving further into the mysteries surrounding the village, Keiichi's paranoia grows after he starts to suspect that someone might be after his life.

attributes.canonicalTitle: Suspicion (Chapter: Spirited Away by the Demon, Part 3)

attributes.synopsis: Unnerved by Rena and Mion's menacing behavior, Keiichi begins to distance himself from his former friends — but it might already be too late.
attributes.description: Unnerved by Rena and Mion's menacing behavior, Keiichi begins to distance himself from his former friends — but it might already be too late.

titles.en_us: Disturbance (Chapter: Spirited Away by the Demon, Part 4)
titles.ja_jp: 鬼隠し編 其ノ四 歪

attributes.canonicalTitle: Disturbance (Chapter: Spirited Away by the Demon, Part 4)

attributes.synopsis: Keiichi meets his friends in town to win prizes at a card game. Afterwards, at a restaurant, he is surprised to see Mion as a waitress, and even more surprised to find out it's not actually Mion.
attributes.description: Keiichi meets his friends in town to win prizes at a card game. Afterwards, at a restaurant, he is surprised to see Mion as a waitress, and even more surprised to find out it's not actually Mion.

titles.ja_jp: 綿流し編 其ノ壱 嫉妬

attributes.synopsis: The day for the Cotton Drifting Festival has arrived, and during Rika's ritual performance, Keiichi is taken to see the sacred festival storehouse.
attributes.description: The day for the Cotton Drifting Festival has arrived, and during Rika's ritual performance, Keiichi is taken to see the sacred festival storehouse.

titles.ja_jp: 綿流し編 其ノ弐 タカノ

attributes.synopsis: Keiichi indirectly confesses to Rika about sneaking into the forbidden shrine, and he fears his admission may have put Rika and Satako's lives in danger.
attributes.description: Keiichi indirectly confesses to Rika about sneaking into the forbidden shrine, and he fears his admission may have put Rika and Satako's lives in danger.

titles.ja_jp: 綿流し編 其ノ参 嘘

attributes.synopsis: The truth behind the recent incidents and the dark origins of Hinamizawa finally start to unravel as Keiichi and Rena decide to confront their suspect.
attributes.description: The truth behind the recent incidents and the dark origins of Hinamizawa finally start to unravel as Keiichi and Rena decide to confront their suspect.

titles.ja_jp: 綿流し編 其ノ四 願い

attributes.synopsis: When Keiichi's parents leave for Tokyo for a few days, Satoko and Rika offer to help him around the house and he learns about the mysterious disappearance of Satoko's older brother, Satoshi.
attributes.description: When Keiichi's parents leave for Tokyo for a few days, Satoko and Rika offer to help him around the house and he learns about the mysterious disappearance of Satoko's older brother, Satoshi.

titles.ja_jp: 祟殺し編 其の壱 兄

attributes.synopsis: Satoko has been absent from school, and Keiichi starts to worry about her family situation after discovering the cause of her absence.
attributes.description: Satoko has been absent from school, and Keiichi starts to worry about her family situation after discovering the cause of her absence.

titles.ja_jp: 祟殺し編 其の弐 キズナ

attributes.synopsis: Following Satoko’s disturbing panic attack in the classroom, Keiichi’s concern for her well-being grows to the point where he plans to take matters into his own hands.
attributes.description: Following Satoko’s disturbing panic attack in the classroom, Keiichi’s concern for her well-being grows to the point where he plans to take matters into his own hands.

attributes.synopsis: After strange encounters with Takano, Dr. Irie, and Inspector Oishi, Keiichi starts to question whether the previous night's incident actually occurred.
attributes.description: After strange encounters with Takano, Dr. Irie, and Inspector Oishi, Keiichi starts to question whether the previous night's incident actually occurred.

titles.ja_jp: 祟殺し編 其の四 失しモノ

attributes.synopsis: When Keiichi heads to Satoko's house and finds her in need of medical attention, he becomes convinced that Oyashiro-sama's curse may be the cause of all these recent misfortunes.
attributes.description: When Keiichi heads to Satoko's house and finds her in need of medical attention, he becomes convinced that Oyashiro-sama's curse may be the cause of all these recent misfortunes.

attributes.description: Four years ago, during the Hinamizawa dam incident, young police investigator Mamoru Akasaka comes to the village to investigate a child kidnapping, where he meets young Rika.

titles.ja_jp: 暇潰し編 其の壱 ヒナミザワ

attributes.synopsis: Mamoru and Oishi discover some important clues, and head to the district of Takatsudo to continue the search for the Cabinet Minister's son. Little do they know, there are much more sinister forces at work.
attributes.description: Mamoru and Oishi discover some important clues, and head to the district of Takatsudo to continue the search for the Cabinet Minister's son. Little do they know, there are much more sinister forces at work.

titles.ja_jp: 暇潰し編 其の弐 兆し

attributes.synopsis: The events from The Cotton Drifting Chapter are retold from another point of view. After two years away from the village, Shion comes back to Hinamizawa.
attributes.description: The events from The Cotton Drifting Chapter are retold from another point of view. After two years away from the village, Shion comes back to Hinamizawa.

titles.ja_jp: 目明し編 其の壱 初恋

attributes.synopsis: The recent incident at school has left Shion feeling very uneasy. She is able to muster the courage to call Satoshi, only to receive an apology from him. Something doesn't seem right.
attributes.description: The recent incident at school has left Shion feeling very uneasy. She is able to muster the courage to call Satoshi, only to receive an apology from him. Something doesn't seem right.

titles.ja_jp: 目明し編 其の弐 ケジメ

attributes.synopsis: When Shion decides to investigate Satoshi's disappearance, she meets Takano at the library, who tells her more about the dark history of Hinamizawa. The very next year, the past begins to repeat itself.
attributes.description: When Shion decides to investigate Satoshi's disappearance, she meets Takano at the library, who tells her more about the dark history of Hinamizawa. The very next year, the past begins to repeat itself.

attributes.description: After questioning Headmaster Kimiyoshi for information about the previous murders and Satoshi's disappearance, Shion sets her sights on another one of the Three Great Families.

attributes.description: Shion tricks Keiichi into thinking that he may have put his friends in danger. However, when he figures out the truth, Shion is confronted by Keiichi and Rena.

titles.ja_jp: 目明し編 其の六 断罪

attributes.synopsis: After a day of summer fun, Rena goes to the garbage dump, where she begins to remember things from her troubling family background.
attributes.description: After a day of summer fun, Rena goes to the garbage dump, where she begins to remember things from her troubling family background.

titles.ja_jp: 罪滅し編 其の壱 幸せ

attributes.synopsis: Rena learns of Rina's plot, and a confrontation at the deserted garbage dump triggers another disastrous chain of events.
attributes.description: Rena learns of Rina's plot, and a confrontation at the deserted garbage dump triggers another disastrous chain of events.

titles.ja_jp: 罪滅し編 其の弐 還る処

attributes.synopsis: While studying Takano's scrapbooks, Rena starts to uncover the the truth behind Oyashiro-sama's curse and Hinamizawa's dark past.
attributes.description: While studying Takano's scrapbooks, Rena starts to uncover the the truth behind Oyashiro-sama's curse and Hinamizawa's dark past.

titles.ja_jp: 罪滅し編 其の参 34号文書

attributes.synopsis: By discovering the truth behind Oyashiro-sama's curse, Rena has become a target of one of the Three Great Families, and she decides to go into hiding.
attributes.description: By discovering the truth behind Oyashiro-sama's curse, Rena has become a target of one of the Three Great Families, and she decides to go into hiding.

titles.ja_jp: 罪滅し編 其の四 地球侵略

attributes.synopsis: Rena has returned, but not for the right reasons, as she causes a serious crisis at the school, and demands the police investigate the Three Great Families' connection to Oyashiro-sama's curse. What will become of Keiichi and his friends?
attributes.description: Rena has returned, but not for the right reasons, as she causes a serious crisis at the school, and demands the police investigate the Three Great Families' connection to Oyashiro-sama's curse. What will become of Keiichi and his friends?

titles.ja_jp: 罪滅し編 其の伍 リテイク
